body_html:
@ReyhaneAskari I will ask once again, what command line arguments did you use for word_language_model? What repo are you using for fp16 training of word_language_model? What specifically is your end goal?

I don't see anything in here that is actually a pytorch issue. Please open a discussion on pytorch forums and post a link here so I can follow it.
